The Lenovo Legion Go 2 is almost here, and Lenovo just dropped everything we’ve been waiting for—pricing, full specs, and big upgrades! We’re getting an 8.8-inch OLED display with VRR, plus two powerful APU options: the AMD Ryzen Z2 and the Z2 Extreme.
This could be the handheld gaming PC that takes 2025 by storm.Is the new Legion Go 2 worth it? Will you be picking one up? Let me know what you think in the comments below—I’m curious if this has you as hyped as I am.
